dct_description_sm: Assignation at bottom left states: tot Amsterdam Nieuwelÿks uÿt Gegeven door Cornelis Dankerts voor aen op de Nieuwendÿck in den Atlas met Previlegie.
With imprint changed to: tot Amsterdam By R. & J. Wetstein en William Smith en te Leiden By Samuel Luchtmans. Biblical text on verso in Dutch.
With no imprint at bottom left.
By R. & J. Wetstein en William Smith en te Leiden By Samuel Luchtmans

California as an island with an indented northern coast. N. Albion and Pt. d Fr. Draco at north end. A large area called Terra Esonis lies to the northwest separated from California by Straat Anian. The maps are encircled by a diagram of an eclipse, astronomical drawings and explanations, and two polar projections, the northern one showing California as an island. Issued as a separate publication or a Dutch bible.
